name: Driving Test
title: Certified Driver's Test at our North Wales location
description: Via specializes in carpool rides, and many customers prefer the lower prices available. The app finds drivers with people that are taking a similar route to the user.Many users are attracted to Via because it’s one of the best services for carpooling on the market, offering significant cost savings and a reduced carbon footprint.Driver Training Services is certified to administer the Class-C Non-Commercial Driver’s Test at our location.You do not need to be a student of ours to take the test here.  Call our office for more information or to schedule.If you register on-line, once we receive your registration, we will contact you directly within one business day to schedule your exam. We usually have test appointment slots available within 2-3 days from when you register.  Please be sure to add the best contact information when you register.

name: Behind The Wheel
title: We are committed to teaching your teen how to be a safe, defensive driver for the rest of his/her life. We focus on teaching precision vehicle control, hazard recognition and safety threat awareness
description: All of the lessons are done in our dual-control vehicles and are video and audio recorded for our training purposes. These recordings are not shared with anyone.All of our instructors are leaders in their field, subject matter experts and accomplished teachers who are professional, licensed and are continually receiving updated training.All of the Behind The Wheel training is done within a 10 mile radius of our office location, or from one of the AAA offices that we partner with King of Prussia, Warrington and Willow Grove Skills covered: starting, signaling, stopping, steering, turning, backing up, intersections, three-point turns, parking, school bus safety, railroad crossings, sharing the road (other vehicles and pedestrians and entering/exiting highways.

name: Driving Test
title: Driver Training Services is certified to administer the Class-C Non-Commercial Driver’s Test at our location.
description: If you register on-line, once we receive your registration, we will contact you directly within one business day to schedule your exam. We sually have test appointment slots available within 2-3 days from when you register.lease be sure to add the best contact information when you register.You will take the test in your car or you can rent a car for $50 You will come to our office at 634 E.Main Street Lansdale, PA 19446 in the Hillcrest Shopping Center

name: Accelerated Driving Prep Course
title: Driver Training Services is certified to administer the Class-C Non-Commercial Driver’s Test at our location.
description: Welcome to the Accelerated Driving Prep Course. Driver Training Services created this program in response to the multitudes of students who passed their permit test, yet still are having issues applying the information learned when driving. The course is designed to give an in-depth view of the safe driving material covered, something the traditional permit test fails to do. For example, the traditional permit test may be helpful for identifying road signs, but our course will not just help drivers to identify the signs, but also help to explain what they mean and how to respond. Because the Accelerated Driving Prep Course is particularly helpful at giving new drivers information that experienced drivers already understand and practice, we highly recommended this course for newly permitted drivers as well as those preparing to take the test to be permitted.

name: Driver's Education (Online)
title: Driver's Education Online Course.
description: As an alternative to classroom study, Driver Training Services offers the 30-hour novice driver theory class online. This course allows the student to learn in the comfort of their own home, at their own pace, on their own schedule.This program can be taken before you get your permit and is very helpful in studying for the permit test.The program guides young drivers through each module, systematically progressing from rules of the road and signage through basic maneuvers and on to hazard recognition and risk reduction skills.  You will only be able to take 2 lessons a day so, this course will take about 2 weeks to complete.Our online theory program is approved by the Pennsylvania Department of Education and may qualify you for insurance discounts – check with your insurance agent for more information. This course costs $99 and can be accessed through your studnet portal on DTS home page.

name: Driving Simulator
title: Driving Simulator Training
description: Simulator training assists drivers in developing the “do”, not just the “know”. As new drivers face dangerous situations on the road, it is important they not only know what to do, but that they do what is necessary as they encounter driving hazards. Research indicates that simulator training assists in the development of brain “muscle memory”, resulting in safer, swifter responses by the driver.

name: Skill Refresher
title: Driving Simulator Training
description: Maybe you’ve been okay so far – no crashes or tickets in a while. But if you do any of these things, it’s only a matter of time before something bad happens. Everyone’s luck runs out at some point.Did you know that, if you’re in a crash and the responding officer writes you up for one of these violations, your insurance premiums could rise by 25% or more? That’s even if you’re not at fault.The good news is, we can help. Take a drive with one of our professional driving instructors and get some expert feedback about your driving. In most cases, we can recommend simple behavior changes that can dramatically decrease your odds of being involved in a car crash. We ask you to meet us at our office in Lansdale and we do an hour at a time for $95.00.

name: Assesment
title: Driving Competency Assessments
description: A Driver Competency Assessment answers the question, “how much is this person at risk when operating a vehicle or using the road system, in comparison with others in a normal urban driving environment?”A DCA is not a road test – there is no pass or fail. Instead, it’s a standardized performance measure, scored by computer that gives employers a clear numerical ranking for a particular driver as compared with thousands of others.It’s up to individual companies to decide how much risk they are willing to take. Some companies are satisfied administering a simple online quiz to their drivers a few times each decade. Others do nothing and hope for the best. What is your company willing to do to limit its liability and ensure it has the safest drivers out there on public roads?.

name: Fleet Safety Certification
title: Driving Competency Assessments
description: Empower Your Fleet Employees! As a manager of a large or small fleet of vehicles in Pennsylvania, we know how important your bottom line is. Our online Fleet Safety Course Utilizes our proprietary S.P.I.D.E.R method. Scientifically proven to reduce workplace accidents, make safer choices, and help you keep the cost of operating a fleet of drivers in your state..
